byline.original: By MARTIN HUTCHINSON and ROBERT CYRAN

snippet: Why writing off debts may not necessarily increase economic growth; and why investors should be on the lookout for Apple’s new creative/destructive impacts.
lead_paragraph: Why writing off debts may not necessarily increase economic growth; and why investors should be on the lookout for Apple’s new creative/destructive impacts.

headline.main: The Downside to a Debt Jubilee
